Step 1:- Save maximum four contact numbers of your relatives.

Step 2:- Tap TRY IT button to test the functionality of the SOS.

Step 3:- The app will send SMS with your live location to all four numbers and make phone call to first number. The live location will not be a link, instead it will be longitude, latitude and the exact place wherever you are present, so that your relatives could take action even if they don't have internet connection.

Step 4:- Now, Ladybuddy is ready to help you in emergency situations.

Let's see how you will use ladybuddy in emergency:-

Step 1:- Whenever you go through any unsafe place, just open the app and press back or home button so that the app starts running in the background.

Step 2:- Make Sure that app is running in the background that means it is in the system tray.

Step 3:- Whenever you feel emergency, tapping power button three times will send Emergency message and call, tapping it again three times will start a siren to deviate the culprit.

Step 4:- Make Sure that all these 6 times tapping should be in one minute otherwise you will have to again start tapping count from zero.

Step 5:- Tapping power button again three times or closing the app from background will stop the siren.

Note:- Make sure that tapping power button means screen goes off or on
